description: Meatballs stay tender and juicy when slow cooked, adding rich flavour to the tomato sauce.
name: Slow Cooker Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the meatballs, stirring often, for 5 minutes or until browned all over. Place in the slow cooker.

Heat the rest of the oil in the same pan and cook the onion for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and oregano and cook for 2 minutes. Stir in the passata and pesto then tip into the slow cooker with the meatballs and mix well.
Cook on low for 4 hours and serve with grated parmesan on top and crusty bread on the side, if desired.
